What are the necessary conditions in order to have a complete balance of the several revolving masses in different planes? Which of the following statements are correct?
A. The couples about the reference plane must balance
B. The forces in the reference plane must balance
Rotation in different planes require the balancing of-
Which of the following statements is correct about the balancing of a mechanical system?

answers.a: If it is under static balance, then there will be dynamic balance also
answers.b: If it is under dynamic balance, then there will be static balance also
answers.c: Both static as well as dynamic balance have to be achieved separately
